data.title: Press Releases Archive
data.meta_description: The Stories You Tell Happen Here.
data.text:
APPLICATIONS FOR 2025 ROYAL COURT OPEN THIS WEEK July 29, 2024. Louisville, KY. – The search is on for Kentucky Derby Festival royalty! Young women from Kentucky and Southern Indiana who are full-time college students (in at least their 2nd year) can apply to be part of the 2025 Royal Court. Applications open Thursday, August […]

July 23, 2024. Louisville, KY. – If you are passionate about running and connecting with the community, the Kentucky Derby Festival is looking for you! The Festival is searching for its next team of running experts to represent the 2025 GE Appliances miniMarathon and Marathon, set for Saturday, April 26, 2025. Race officials are accepting […]

June 27, 2024. Louisville, KY. – U.S. Troops around the world will have the opportunity to experience Thunder Over Louisville on the Fourth of July. The Kentucky Derby Festival has partnered with the Kentucky Tourism, Arts & Heritage Cabinet and WDRB to share a special presentation of this year’s Thunder air show and fireworks with […]

June 13, 2024. Louisville, KY. – Now that all the events have wrapped up, the Kentucky Derby Festival is Spring cleaning to prepare for the Festival’s annual Yard Sale next week. The summer tradition is a one-stop shop for finding deals on a variety of Derby Festival merchandise and collectibles. It takes place ONE DAY […]

FESTIVAL CHAIR & DATES FOR SIGNATURE EVENTS ANNOUNCED June 12, 2024. Louisville, KY. – Louisville business leader Alfonso N. “Al” Cornish will Chair the 2025 Kentucky Derby Festival. Cornish, who has served on the Board for 10 years, was elected by the Festival’s Board of Directors at its annual meeting this afternoon. Cornish is the […]

LOCK IN DEALS FOR ONE DAY ONLY May 31, 2024. Louisville, KY. – The Kentucky Derby Festival is hitting the ground running to celebrate Global Running Day on Wednesday, June 5. Runners will receive special pricing on registration for the 2025 GE Appliances miniMarathon and Marathon for one day only! “We’re celebrating Global Running Day […]

May 6, 2024. Louisville, KY. – Derby Festival fans who discovered a Gold Winner Pin in their 2024 Pegasus Pin Sponsorship envelope need to register online at PegasusPins.com by 5 p.m. Wednesday, May 8 to be eligible for the drawing of the $20,000 cash Gold Pin Grand Prize. The winner will be announced on Friday, […]

May 2, 2024. Louisville, KY. This is the schedule for THURSDAY’S AND FRIDAY’S Derby Festival activities. THURSDAY, MAY 2 Derby Festival Day at the Races: KENTUCKIANA HONDA DEALERS KENTUCKY DERBY FESTIVAL DAY AT THE DOWNS. 11:30 AM. Churchill Downs, Fourth Floor, Skye Terrace. Celebrate Thurby at the track with a great view and all-inclusive ticket. […]

May 1, 2024. Louisville, KY. – It was a Battle of the Belles and there’s a new queen of the Ohio River. Upriver rival, the Belle of Cincinnati, was declared the winner of the Shepherd Insurance Great Steamboat Race tonight by judges after crossing the Finish Line first. In the 61st race down the Ohio […]

TICKETS STILL AVAILABLE FOR FESTIVAL DAY AT THE RACES April 30, 2024. LOUISVILLE, KY – The Kentucky Derby Festival is getting in the Thurby spirit with Kentuckiana Honda Dealers Festival Day at the Downs on Thursday, May 2 at Churchill Downs in the 4th floor Skye Terrace. Gates open at 11:30 a.m. and the post-time […]

May 1, 2024. Louisville, KY. This is the schedule for WEDNESDAY’S Derby Festival activities. Rolling on the River!: SHEPHERD INSURANCE KENTUCKY DERBY FESTIVAL GREAT STEAMBOAT RACE. 4:30 – 5:30 PM boarding. 5:45 PM departure. Race begins at 6 PM. The Belle of Louisville and the Belle of Cincinnati will compete for bragging rights on the Ohio […]

SAMTEC RETURNS AS TITLE SPONSOR OF 2024 EVENT April 29, 2024. Louisville, KY. – Bed racing fans filled the stands at Broadbent Arena tonight for the Kentucky Derby Festival’s 35th annual Great Bed Races. Samtec returned for the second year as the Title Sponsor of the 2024 event, which featured 50 teams pushing their decorated […]

April 30, 2024. Louisville, KY. This is the schedule for TUESDAY’S Derby Festival activities. Bettin’ on a Fun Night: KENTUCKY DERBY FESTIVAL TEXAS HOLD’EM TOURNAMENT. 4:30 PM Boarding/check-in. 6 PM Tournament begins, plus one-hour Cruise (subject to river and weather conditions). Belle of Cincinnati, docked at Kroger’s Fest-a-Ville on the Waterfront. $125 Buy-in includes 10,000 in […]

April 29, 2024. LOUISVILLE, KY – Toast the Tuesday of Derby Week at the Commonwealth Credit Union WineFest. Enjoy a spring evening of sipping, savoring and strolling on Tuesday, April 30 from 6 to 9 p.m. at the Mellwood Art Center in the Van Gogh and DaVinci Rooms. Commonwealth Credit Union is the new Title […]

April 28, 2024. Louisville, KY. – The Zoeller Pump Company Pegasus Parade kicked off Derby Week this afternoon as it marched on a Sunday for the third straight year. Fans lined Broadway in downtown Louisville in partly sunny, 80-degree weather to celebrate the founding event of the Kentucky Derby Festival. The theme of this year’s […]

WHAT’S HAPPENING WITH KENTUCKY DERBY FESTIVAL TODAY April 29, 2024. Louisville, KY. This is the schedule for MONDAY’S Derby Festival activities. Beds Are For Racing! SAMTEC KENTUCKY DERBY FESTIVAL GREAT BED RACES. 6 PM Parade of Beds. 7 PM Racing. Broadbent Arena. Beds aren’t for sleeping during Derby Week, they’re for racing! Beds on wheels […]

35th ANNUAL EVENT CELEBRATES DERBY 150 April 27, 2024. Louisville, KY. – Beds aren’t for sleeping during Derby Week, they’re for racing! On Monday, April 29, beds on wheels will hit the racetrack during the Samtec Great Bed Races. Fifty teams are on tap to compete in a race around a figure-eight course inside Broadbent […]

April 28, 2024. Louisville, KY. This is the schedule for SUNDAY’S Derby Festival activities. Pumped For a Parade: ZOELLER PUMP COMPANY KENTUCKY DERBY FESTIVAL PEGASUS® PARADE. 3 PM. West on Broadway from Campbell to 9th streets. Annual parade that kicks off the Derby Week festivities, featuring colorful floats, marching bands, giant inflatables and equestrians. 2024 […]
